name: Export & Share
description: Generate PDF and CSV snapshots of reports for sharing with regional and corporate stakeholders.

prd.problemStatement: Superintendents need to share reports with regional managers and corporate stakeholders. Export capabilities enable distribution of insights beyond the platform.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to export reports to PDF so that I can share with my regional manager
As a superintendent, I want scheduled exports so that reports are automatically distributed
